CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISBLANK(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_1__r.Closed_Won_Date__c), ISBLANK(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_2__r.Closed_Won_Date__c), ISBLANK(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_3__r.Closed_Won_Date__c), ISBLANK(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_4__r.Closed_Won_Date__c), ISBLANK(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_5__r.Closed_Won_Date__c) ), NULL, DATE(2998,1,1) - MAX( DATE(2998,1,1) - BLANKVALUE(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_1__r.Closed_Won_Date__c , DATE(2998,1,1)), DATE(2998,1,1) - BLANKVALUE(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_2__r.Closed_Won_Date__c, DATE(2998,1,1)), DATE(2998,1,1) - BLANKVALUE(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_3__r.Closed_Won_Date__c ,DATE(2998,1,1)), DATE(2998,1,1) - BLANKVALUE(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_4__r.Closed_Won_Date__c, DATE(2998,1,1)), DATE(2998,1,1) - BLANKVALUE(RTL_RelatedOpportunity_5__r.Closed_Won_Date__c, DATE(2998,1,1)) ) )
CustomField.label: Oldest Closed Date Opportunity
